item.title: <fx-message>
item.description: Description Display a message to the user. Attributes Name Description default level ‘modal’, ‘modeless’ or ’ephemeral’ ephemeral ‘modal’ - modal dialog window ‘sticky’ - sticky popup message ’ephemeral’ - auto-closing popup message default value XPath expression which resolves to message Events none Examples fx-message actions Binding the delay attribute fx-control Hello World the if attribute instances lazy modelItem creation during UI init the while attribute
